bill_title: require the transfer of certain funds.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to require the transfer of certain funds. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. For the purposes of this Act, the term, cement trust fund, means the trust fund created by Article XIII, § 20 of the Constitution of the State of South Dakota. Section 2. If in any fiscal year the interest earnings credited to the cement trust fund do not exceed twelve million dollars, then immediately after the twelve million dollar transfer provided for by Article XIII, § 20 of the Constitution of the State of South Dakota has taken place, the commissioner of the Bureau of Finance and Management shall transfer the difference between twelve million dollars and the interest earnings credited to the cement trust fund from the general fund to the cement trust fund. 350 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.027 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
